Texts.Chs: 经过漫长的七年，USCM颁布了新的政策，我们的掩体将对外面的友好生命开放。我相信你们很多人都知道，许多物种出现在我们的门口，但我们拒绝他们进入。
Texts.Eng: After seven long years, the USCM has decreed that our bunkers shall be opened to friendly life from the outside. As I'm sure many of you are aware, numerous species turn up at our door, and we refuse them entry.

Texts.Chs: 很明显，他们中的许多人认为我们的地堡是某种商店。因此，我们决定允许他们到处看看。也许我们甚至可以招募一些新成员，如果需要的话。
Texts.Eng: It is apparent that many of them believe our bunker to be some kind of shop. As such, we have decided to allow them access to take a look around. Perhaps we can even enlist a few new members, should the need arise.
